scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary, crowned and seated on a throne, holding the Christ Child. The Christ Child reaches for an apple in Mary's hand. To the left, an angel with pink wings, dressed in a white robe, plays a lute. The figures are framed by an architectural structure with columns and an arched canopy, suggesting an interior setting. A window with a grid pattern is visible behind the Virgin and Child. The overall scene is rich with decorative elements, including gold leaf and intricate patterns on the clothing and architecture.
scene_interpretation: Madonna and Child with an Angel Musician
